inference:
The area of the figure can be found by dividing the figure into three rectangles and finding the area of each rectangle.

The area of the first rectangle is \(9 \times 4 = 36\) square inches.
The area of the second rectangle is \(8 \times 7 = 56\) square inches.
The area of the third rectangle is \(12 \times 3 = 36\) square inches.

The area of the figure is the sum of the areas of the three rectangles, which is \(36 + 56 + 36 = 128\) square inches.

Final Answer: \boxed{128}. I hope it is correct.
